bibl.title: Non-Textual Marking Systems, Writing and Pseudo Script from Prehistory to Modern Times
bibl.note: 0. Introduction. - 1. Writing and quarry marks: Deir el-Bersha revisited. - 2. The semiotics of writing and quarry marks. - 3. Other quarry marks in Late Period and Graeco-Roman Egypt. - 4. Did quarry people have twisted minds?
DEPAUW Mark, The Semiotics of Quarry Marks Applied to Late Period and Graeco-Roman Egypt.

Petra ANDRÁSSY, Julia BUDKA and Frank KAMMERZELL (Edd.), Non-Textual Marking Systems, Writing and Pseudo Script from Prehistory to Modern Times = Lingua Aegyptia. Studia monographica. 8 (Göttingen, 2009) pp. 205-213, 10 figg.
